PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3atrueDisablefalse8154f49f-1e46-4d10-8e85-94c09fed12fbParse ResponseSystem.Xml.XmlDocument xDoc = context.Data.ToXmlDocument(); if (xDoc.DocumentElement.FirstChild.InnerText.ToString() == "DesignNotFound") { context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"] = "false"; } else { string currentFacility = xDoc.DocumentElement.FirstChild.InnerText.ToString(); string pvFacilityFilter = context.EnvironmentVariables["PVFacilityFilter"].ToString().ToUpper(); string[] pvFacilityFilterList = pvFacilityFilter.Split(';'); foreach (var facility in pvFacilityFilterList) { if (facility.Trim() == currentFacility.ToUpper().Trim()) { context.Instance.TraceInformation("Facility Found."); context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"] = "True"; } } } context.Instance.TraceInformation("Final Bool Value for PVFacilityFilter :" + context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"].ToString()); NeuronNeuron.PipelinesNeuron.EsbSystem, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Core, Version=4.0.0.0,
